price: 127. Мре bankumu ya bato ya falo balobi: Boye ozali kotika Mûssa na bato naye mpo babebisa o kati ya mokili Mpe ye moko atika yo na banzambe nayo? Alobi: Tokoboma bana na bango ya mibali mpe tokotika basi na bango na bomoyi mpamba te ya soló, biso tozali na bokonzi likolo lia bango.
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ أَتَذَرُ مُوسَىٰ وَقَوۡمَهُۥ لِيُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَيَذَرَكَ وَءَالِهَتَكَۚ قَالَ سَنُقَتِّلُ أَبۡنَآءَهُمۡ وَنَسۡتَحۡيِۦ نِسَآءَهُمۡ وَإِنَّا فَوۡقَهُمۡ قَٰهِرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-mala-u min qawmi fir'ʿawna atadharu mūsā waqawmahu liyuf'sidū fī al-arḍi wayadharaka waālihataka qāla sanuqattilu abnāahum wanastaḥyī nisāahum wa-innā fawqahum qāhirūna
